page.title: 07HOME LIFE IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: We are fortunate in Morfa Bychan to have regular deliveries of fresh foods from local producers.The meat,fish bread and vegetables are all of very good quality. This village has a high percentage of elderly people,many of whom rely on frozen and tinned food.The busy mother also makes use of her deep-freezer and micro-wave oven to prepare family meals quickly. School children have their lunch at school or they buy chips and snack food in Porthmadog.All the children enjoy chips and cola type drinks. Formal meals are unusual in the busy homes.Family life is often hectic.
